package.name: Image_Color2
package.summary: Color conversion and mixing for PHP5.
package.description: PHP5 color conversion and mixing Currently supported color models: * CMYK - Used in printing. * Grayscale - Perceptively weighted grayscale. * Hex - Hex RGB colors i.e. #abcdef * Hsl - Used in CSS3 to define colors. * Hsv - Used by Photoshop and other graphics pacakges. * Named - RGB value for named colors like black, khaki, etc. * WebsafeHex - Just like Hex but rounded to websafe colors.

release.notes: Made several small syntax changes to satisfy a conditional PEAR vote: http://pear.php.net/pepr/pepr-vote-show.php?id=297&handle=justinpatrin

* Added the CMYK color model. * Changed comment blocks to the new style. * Changed the non-RGB array format to use values between 0 and 1. * Changed the string format to allow both percentages or float fractions between 0 and 1.

The majority of effort in this release has been focused on the documentation. I know I sure don't like messing with badly documented projects.
Hex: * Added support for the short form (#abc instead of #aabbcc).
Named: * Spaces are now ignored.
Grayscale: * Fixed a bug preventing correct color conversion.

This is the first version. Currently supported color models: * Hex - Hex RGB colors i.e. #abcdef * WebsafeHex - Just like Hex but rounded to websafe colors. * Named - RGB value for named colors like black, khaki, etc. * Hsl - Used in CSS3 to define colors. * Hsv - Used by Photoshop and other graphics pacakges.
